title: BAINBRIDGE PARK APARTMENTS
posting_body: ['Thank you for your interest in Bainbridge Park Apartments.', 'Please find below rental and fee information for the apartment units at Bainbridge Park Apartments.', '2 Bedroom / 1 Bath staring at $1475 **LUXURY PLANK FLOORING AVAILABLE**', 'Floor plan options 910 sq.', 'ft. Includes private entry, energy efficient appliances, FULL-SIZE WASHER AND DRYER in every unit, patio, central heat/air conditioning and spacious living area.', 'Our Community also features a 24-hour fitness center and swimming pool.', 'Fees and Utilities', 'Application Fee $60/ adult (Non-Refundable)', 'Security Deposit depending on credit approval', 'Electric paid directly to DTE', 'Gas paid directly to DTE', 'Water and Sewer billed based on usage', 'Trash $ 5 / Month', 'One-Time Pet Fee $ 250 (Non-Refundable)', 'Pet Rent $ 50 / month per each pet', 'We allow two pets per apartment and breed restrictions do apply']
